Economy

Progress in IMF talks, but disagreements remain, says Maait

Economy

Debt Watch

CIRA’s maiden future flow issuance could close next month.

Development Finance

What We’re Tracking Today

Fed delivers another super-sized rate hike ⁠— and there could be more coming.

Progress in IMF talks, but disagreements remain, says Maait

Egypt is working to resolve differences with the IMF in talks for a fresh assistance program, Finance Minister Mohamed Maait said in a round of interviews yesterday.
